gdpr.title: GDPR & CCPA Compliant
gdpr.description: All workflows respect opt-out preferences, unsubscribe links, and data residency requirements. We're fully compliant with global privacy standards.

brand.title: Brand Protection
brand.description: Real-time monitoring ensures every interaction stays on-topic, professional, and perfectly aligned with your brand's voice and guidelines.

bottomCta.title: AI in Action
bottomCta.quote: See our AI live handling conversations like an agent for your business, so your team can focus on what matters.
